name: Aimtropolis
description:
Are you prepared to demonstrate your aiming skills? Each game in AIMTROPOLIS consists of 8 mini-games, which are randomly selected according to the chosen difficulty. Every mini-game offers a distinctive and diverse experience. Let the mini-games begin!





  • 20 mini-games, each month we will add 5 more, until we reach 50. (free updates)
  • 8 mini-games per game.
  • 5 Different worlds.
  • National and worldwide rankings.
  • 4 different difficulties to choose from.
  • Future updates: achievements, skins, extra bonus levels...





    The worlds are unique and in each one you will see a completely different setting. In Westerland you will be in the shoes of the sheriff, and you will have to eliminate all the bandits that have invaded the town.  Or travel to the Island where you must destroy the cannonballs shot at by the pirate ships.

    Every time you finish a game your score will be recorded in the rankings and from time to time, we will reward those at the top of the rankings, be the best in all the mini-games!
